cause.description:
Now in its second century, Audubon connects people with birds, nature and the environment that supports us all. Our national network of community-based nature centers, chapters, scientific, education, and advocacy programs engages millions of people from all walks of life in conservation action to protect and restore the natural world.
www.audubon.org
1. Together, we can create a world in which birds, other wildlife and people can all thrive.
2. Become a member of Audubon and join a community of people who care about nature.
cause.mission: Audubon's mission is to conserve and restore natural ecosystems, focusing on birds, other wildlife, and their habitats for the benefit of humanity and the earth's biological diversity.
cause.name: National Audubon Society
